data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bouzan, Rodrigo Salvador, Iniesta, Luiz Felipe M., Brescovit, Antonio Domingos (2018): A review of the millipede genus Rupidesmus Schubart, 1952 (Polydesmida: Chelodesmidae). Zootaxa 4434 (3): 589-599, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4434.3.12|3 occurrences
